example1: The aircraft carrier sailed across the ocean.
example2: An aircraft carrier can hold many airplanes.
example2Meaning: 항공 모함은 많은 비행기를 실을 수 있어요.

example1: The airplane flew high in the sky.
example2: Airplanes help people travel quickly.
example2Meaning: 비행기는 사람들이 빨리 여행할 수 있도록 도와줘요.

example1: The alarm clock rings in the morning.
example2: I set the alarm clock to wake up early.
example2Meaning: 나는 일찍 일어나려고 알람 시계를 맞췄어요.

example1: The ambulance rushed to the hospital.
example2: An ambulance carries sick people to the hospital.

example1: The angel helped the lost child.
example2: Angels are kind and protect us.

example1: Birds fly south for animal migration.
example1Meaning: 새들이 동물 이동을 위해 남쪽으로 날아요.
example2: Some animals migrate to find food.
example2Meaning: 몇몇 동물들은 먹이를 찾기 위해 이동해요.

example1: The ant carried food back to its home.
example2: Ants live in big groups called colonies.
example2Meaning: 개미는 군집이라고 불리는 큰 그룹에서 살아가요.

example1: The blacksmith used the anvil to shape the metal.
example1Meaning: 대장장이가 금속을 다듬기 위해 모루를 사용했어요.
example2: An anvil is a heavy block used by blacksmiths.

example1: I eat an apple every day.
example2: Apples are sweet and healthy.

example1: She waved her arm to say hello.
example2: He hurt his arm while playing soccer.

example1: I love eating asparagus with my dinner.
example1Meaning: 나는 저녁에 아스파라거스를 먹는 걸 좋아해요.
example2: Asparagus is green and healthy.

example1: The man chopped wood with an axe.
example2: An axe is used to cut trees.

example1: She put her books in the backpack.
example2: A backpack helps carry many things.
example2Meaning: 가방은 많은 것을 들고 다닐 수 있어요.

example1: I like to eat a banana for breakfast.
example1Meaning: 나는 아침에 바나나를 먹는 것을 좋아해요.
example2: Bananas are yellow and sweet.

example1: She put a bandage on her knee.
example2: A bandage helps to protect a wound.
example2Meaning: 붕대는 상처를 보호하는 데 도움이 돼요.

example1: The animals sleep in the barn at night.
example2: The barn is red and very big.

example1: We play baseball in the park every Saturday.
example1Meaning: 우리는 매주 토요일에 공원에서 야구를 해요.
example2: He hit the baseball with a bat.

example1: The baseball bat is made of wood.
example2: She swung the baseball bat and hit the ball.
example2Meaning: 그녀는 야구 방망이를 휘둘러 공을 쳤어요.

example1: She put the apples in the basket.
example2: A basket can be used to carry fruits.
example2Meaning: 바구니는 과일을 나르는 데 사용할 수 있어요.

example1: They played basketball at school.
example2: Basketball is a fun game to play with friends.
example2Meaning: 농구는 친구들과 함께 할 때 재미있는 게임이에요.

example1: The bat flew out of the cave at night.
example2: Bats use their ears to find food.
example2Meaning: 박쥐는 음식을 찾기 위해 귀를 사용해요.

example1: She took a bath in the bathtub.
example2: The bathtub is full of warm water.
example2Meaning: 욕조는 따뜻한 물로 가득 차 있어요.

example1: We built a sandcastle at the beach.
example2: The beach is very beautiful with blue water.
example2Meaning: 해변은 파란 물과 함께 매우 아름다워요.

example1: The bear lives in the forest.
example2: Bears like to eat honey.

example1: He has a big, brown beard.
example1Meaning: 그는 크고 갈색의 수염을 가지고 있어요.
example2: Some men grow a beard to look older.
example2Meaning: 몇몇 남자들은 나이가 더 많아 보이기 위해 수염을 길러요.

example1: I sleep on my bed every night.
example2: My bed is very comfortable.

example1: A bee makes honey.
example2: Bees fly from flower to flower.

example1: I wear a belt with my pants.
example2: My belt is black.

example1: We sat on the bench at the park.
example2: There is a bench under the tree.

example1: I ride my bicycle to school.
example2: Bicycles have two wheels.

example1: I use binoculars to see birds far away.
example1Meaning: 나는 멀리 있는 새들을 보기 위해 쌍안경을 사용해요.
example2: Binoculars help you see things closer.
example2Meaning: 쌍안경은 물체를 더 가까이 보게 해요.

example1: The bird is flying in the sky.
example2: I saw a bird sitting on the tree.
example2Meaning: 나는 나무에 앉아 있는 새를 봤어요.

example1: I had a birthday cake at my party.
example2: The birthday cake has candles on it.

example1: Blackberries grow on bushes.
example2: I like eating blackberries.

example1: Blueberries are small and sweet.
example2: I put blueberries in my cereal.

example1: I read a book every night.
example2: This book is very interesting.

example1: A boomerang comes back when you throw it.
example2: I saw someone playing with a boomerang.
example2Meaning: 나는 누군가가 부메랑으로 놀고 있는 것을 봤어요.

example1: I opened the bottle with the bottlecap.
example2: The bottlecap is made of metal.

example1: He wears a bowtie at the party.
example2: The bowtie is very colorful.

example1: She is wearing a bracelet on her wrist.
example2: I bought a bracelet for my friend.

example1: The brain helps us think and learn.
example2: Your brain controls your body.

example1: She ate bread for breakfast.
example2: The bakery sells fresh bread every day.

example1: We crossed the bridge over the river.
example1Meaning: 우리는 강 위에 있는 다리를 건넜어요.
example2: The bridge connects the two cities.

example1: Broccoli is very healthy.
example2: She added broccoli to the salad.

example1: He used a broom to clean the floor.
example1Meaning: 그는 바닥을 청소하기 위해 빗자루를 사용했어요.
example2: The broom is in the closet.

example1: She filled the bucket with water.
example2: We used a bucket to wash the car.
example2Meaning: 우리는 차를 씻기 위해 양동이를 사용했어요.

example1: The bulldozer cleared the land.
example2: A bulldozer is very strong and big.

example1: We took the bus to school.
example2: The bus stop is near my house.
example2Meaning: 버스 정류장은 우리 집 근처에 있어요.

example1: A bird is hiding in the bush.
example2: The bush has small green leaves.

example1: The butterfly is flying over the flowers.
example2: I saw a beautiful butterfly in the garden.

example1: The cactus grows in the desert.
example2: Cactus plants need little water.

example1: She baked a chocolate cake.
example2: We had cake at the party.

example1: I used a calculator to solve the math problem.
example1Meaning: 나는 수학 문제를 풀기 위해 계산기를 사용했어요.
example2: The calculator helps me do my homework faster.
example2Meaning: 계산기는 내가 숙제를 더 빨리 할 수 있도록 도와줘요.

example1: She marked her birthday on the calendar.
example2: The calendar shows the days of each month.

example1: The camel lives in the desert.
example2: Camels have humps on their backs.

example1: He used a camera to take pictures.
example1Meaning: 그는 사진을 찍기 위해 카메라를 사용했어요.
example2: My camera has a zoom feature.

example1: The soldiers used camouflage to blend in.
example1Meaning: 군인들은 주변에 섞이기 위해 위장을 사용했어요.
example2: The chameleon uses camouflage to hide.

example1: We made a campfire at the campsite.
example2: They roasted marshmallows over the campfire.

example1: She lit a candle during the blackout.
example2: The candle has a nice scent.

example1: The pirates fired a cannon.
example2: The old castle has a cannon outside.

example1: They paddled a canoe on the lake.
example2: A canoe is a small, narrow boat.

example1: We drove the car to the beach.
example2: My dad's car is blue.

example1: The rabbit ate a carrot.
example2: Carrots are orange and crunchy.

example1: The king lives in a castle.
example2: The castle has tall towers.

example1: The cat is sleeping on the couch.
example2: She has a black and white cat.

example1: The ceiling fan keeps the room cool.
example2: We turned on the ceiling fan in summer.

example1: She plays the cello in the orchestra.
example2: The cello makes a deep, beautiful sound.

example1: He forgot his cell phone at home.
example2: I use my cell phone to call my friends.

example1: Please sit on the chair.
example2: The chair is next to the table.

example1: The chandelier lights up the room.
example2: A beautiful chandelier hangs from the ceiling.

example1: They go to church every Sunday.
example2: The church has a tall steeple.

example1: He drew a circle on the paper.
example2: A circle has no corners.

example1: She learned to play the clarinet.
example2: The clarinet is a woodwind instrument.

example1: The clock shows the time.
example2: We have a clock in the living room.

example1: There is a big cloud in the sky.
example2: The cloud looks like a fluffy pillow.

example1: She drank coffee from a coffee cup.
example2: The coffee cup is on the table.

example1: The compass shows us the direction.
example2: He used a compass to find his way.
example2Meaning: 그는 길을 찾기 위해 나침반을 사용했어요.

example1: She does her homework on the computer.
example2: I play games on my computer.

example1: He loves chocolate chip cookies.
example2: She baked cookies for her friends.

example1: They kept the drinks in the cooler.
example2: The cooler kept our food fresh.

example1: She is sitting on the couch.
example2: The couch is very comfortable.

example1: The cow gives us milk.
example2: There is a cow in the field.

example1: We saw a crab at the beach.
example2: The crab walks sideways.

example1: She colored the picture with crayons.
example2: He has a box of crayons.

example1: The crocodile lives in the river.
example2: She saw a big crocodile at the zoo.

example1: The king wore a golden crown.
example2: She made a crown from flowers.

example1: They traveled on a cruise ship.
example2: The cruise ship was very large.

example1: She poured juice into the cup.
example2: The cup is full of water.

example1: The ring has a big diamond.
example2: Diamonds are very shiny.

example1: They put the plates in the dishwasher.
example2: The dishwasher cleans the dishes.

example1: He jumped off the diving board.
example2: The diving board is at the pool.

example1: The dog is playing in the yard.
example2: She has a pet dog.

example1: We saw a dolphin at the aquarium.
example2: The dolphin is very smart.

example1: She likes chocolate donuts.
example2: I ate a donut for breakfast.

example1: He opened the door and went inside.
example2: The door is made of wood.

example1: The dragon breathes fire.
example2: She read a story about a dragon.

example1: She put her clothes in the dresser.
example2: The dresser is next to the bed.

example1: He used a drill to make a hole.
example2: The drill is in the toolbox.

example1: He plays the drums in a band.
example2: The drums are very loud.

example1: The duck swims in the pond.
example2: We saw a duck at the park.
